thread.title: AR Rahman has a Valentine’s Day gift for his fans
thread.title_full: AR Rahman has a Valentine’s Day gift for his fans - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: AR Rahman has a Valentine’s Day gift for his fans
text: There's yet another good news for Mani Rathnam- AR Rahman fans. The second single from the ace director's film, Kaatru Veliyidai, is all set to be released on Valentine's Day (February 14). The track is titled Vaan . The buzz is that this is the same number that was played in the teaser of Kaatru Veliyidai. It was only recently that the first single from the film, Azhagiye , was released. The song has already become a rage among the audience. Kaatru Veliyidai is a romantic subject that has Karthi and Aditi Rao Hydari in the lead. Cinematography for the film is by Ravi Varman.
